message: Let's split it 60/40, a fair and reasonable start!
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of either!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 55/45 is a fairer split than your previous offer.
I'm getting desperate, but I'm willing to give you most of it if you'll just take it and end this!
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Bob. Let's split it 50/50 and put this to rest.
